name: Mine 4 Block
description:
This is a prototype. i want to make this game real. for now, the game have just 2 bugs. 

features:

  • If you cut down a tree from the root, the tree will be completely destroyed.
  • leaf have a little chance to drop apple
  • all blocks have particle.
  • mine or place blocks.
  • sand have physics.
  • lava block'll hurt you.
  • HP,XP,LVL and hunger system.
  • seed'll grow itself and create a completle tree.

next update contents:

  • i'll add more blocks.
  • useable crafting table.
  • more recipes for crafting.
  • i'll add a lot of recipes for crafting table
  • useable weapons (sword-bow)
  • i'll add upgrade table. so you can upgrade your weapons/pickaxe.
  • character sprites.
  • character animations.
  • some enemy and bosses.
  • cave system. (spikes loots bosses etc.)

if you want to support me feel free to support! thanks for all of your supports!
